tika-s0403t40:2_2: Tatiye vinayalakkhaṇe patiṭṭhito lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti. Alajjī (pārā. aṭṭha.
tika-s0403t40:2_3: 1.45) hi bahussutopi samāno lābhagarukatāya tantiṁ visaṁvādetvā uddhammaṁ ubbinayaṁ satthusāsanaṁ dīpetvā sāsane mahantaṁ upaddavaṁ karoti,
tika-s0403t40:2_5: Lajjī pana kukkuccako sikkhākāmo jīvitahetupi tantiṁ avisaṁvādetvā dhammameva vinayameva ca dīpeti,
tika-s0403t40:2_6: satthusāsanaṁ garuṁ katvā ṭhapeti. Evaṁ yo lajjī,
tika-s0403t40:2_7: so vinayaṁ ajahanto avokkamantova lajjibhāvena vinayalakkhaṇe ṭhito hoti patiṭṭhito.
tika-s0403t40:3_0: Asaṁhīroti ettha saṁhīro nāma yo pāḷiyaṁ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vā heṭṭhā vā uparito vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno vitthunati vipphandati, saṇṭhātuṁ na sakkoti, yaṁ yaṁ parena vuccati, taṁ taṁ anujānāti,
tika-s0403t40:3_2: Yo pana pāḷiyaṁ vā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vā heṭṭhupariyavasena vā padapaṭipāṭiyā vā pucchiyamāno na vitthunati na vipphandati,
tika-s0403t40:3_3: ekekalomaṁ saṇḍāsena gaṇhanto viya ‘‘evaṁ mayaṁ vadāma,
tika-s0403t40:3_5: Yamhi pāḷi ca pāḷivinicchayo ca suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ agacchanto tiṭṭhati, ayaṁ vuccati asaṁhīro.
tika-s0403t40:3_6: Yasmā pana evarūpo yaṁ yaṁ parena vuccati, taṁ taṁ nānujānāti,
tika-s0403t40:3_7: attanā suvinicchinitaṁ katvā gahitaṁ aviparītamatthaṁ na vissajjeti,
tika-s0403t40:3_8: tasmā vuttaṁ ‘‘na sakkoti gahitaggahaṇaṁ vissajjāpetu’’nti. Catutthādīni suviññeyyāni.
tika-s0403t40:6_1: Satiavippavāse ṭhitoti kammaṭṭhāne satiṁ avijahitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0403t40:6_2: Pesitattoti kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya nibbānaṁ pesitacitto tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro.
tika-s0403t40:9_1: Dasame adhikarīyanti etthāti adhikaraṇāni. Ke adhikarīyanti? Samathā. Kathaṁ adhikarīyanti? Samanavasena.
tika-s0403t40:9_2: Tasmā te tesaṁ samanavasena pavattantīti āha ‘‘adhikaraṇāni samentī’’tiādi.
tika-s0403t40:9_3: Uppannānaṁ uppanānanti uṭṭhitānaṁ uṭṭhitānaṁ. Samathatthanti samanatthaṁ.
tika-s0403t40:9_5: 3.331) vitthāratoyevāti etthāyaṁ vitthāranayo – adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yo vivādo, idaṁ vivādādhikaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:9_6: Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṁ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca, idaṁ anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ nāma. Mātikāyaṁ āgatā pañca,
tika-s0403t40:9_7: vibhaṅge dveti sattapi āpattikkhandhā, idaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:9_8: Yaṁ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṁ catunnaṁ kammānaṁ karaṇaṁ, idaṁ kiccādhikaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:10_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṁ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t40:10_1: Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṁ yasmiṁ vihāre uppannaṁ tasmiṁyeva vā,
tika-s0403t40:10_3: yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṁ, tattha saṅghena vā,
tika-s0403t40:10_4: saṅghe vūpasametuṁ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi vā vinicchitaṁ sammati.
tika-s0403t40:10_5: Evaṁ sammamāne ca panetasmiṁ yā saṅghasammukhato dhammasammukhato vinayasammukhatā puggalasammukhatā, ayaṁ sammukhāvinayo nāma.
tika-s0403t40:10_6: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa saṅghasāmaggivasena sammukhibhāvo saṅghasammukhatā.
tika-s0403t40:10_7: Sametabbassa vatthuno bhūtattā dhammasammukhatā. Yathā taṁ sametabbaṁ,
tika-s0403t40:10_8: tathevassa samanaṁ vinayasammukhatā. Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati,
tika-s0403t40:11_1: atha naṁ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū ‘‘na mayaṁ sakkoma vūpasametu’’nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti.
tika-s0403t40:11_2: Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṁ bhikkhuṁ salākaggāhāpakaṁ sammannati,
tika-s0403t40:11_3: tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhakesu aññataravasena salākaṁ gāhāpetvā sannipatitāya parisāya dhammavādīnaṁ yebhuyyatāya yathā te dhammavādino vadanti,
tika-s0403t40:11_4: evaṁ vūpasantaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t40:11_6: Yaṁ pana yebhuyyasikākammassa karaṇaṁ, ayaṁ yebhuyyasikā nāma.
tika-s0403t40:12_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
tika-s0403t40:12_1: Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṁ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati,
tika-s0403t40:12_2: tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā,
tika-s0403t40:12_3: sace atthi ayaṁ nāmettha āpattīti evaṁ vinicchitaṁ vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t40:13_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṁsitassa sativinayaṁ yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṁ deti,
tika-s0403t40:13_1: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t40:13_2: Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṁ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t40:13_3: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre ‘‘saratāyasmā evarūpiṁ āpatti’’nti bhikkhūhi codiyamāno ‘‘ummattakena me, āvuso, etaṁ kataṁ,
tika-s0403t40:13_4: nāhaṁ taṁ sarāmī’’ti bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṁ yācati,
tika-s0403t40:13_5: saṅgho cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṁ deti.
tika-s0403t40:13_6: Tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t40:13_7: Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṁ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
tika-s0403t40:13_8: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenaññaṁ paṭicarato pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa ‘‘sacāyaṁ acchinnamūlo bhavissati,
tika-s0403t40:13_9: sammā vattitvā osāraṇaṁ labhissati. Sace chinnamūlo,
tika-s0403t40:13_10: ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī’’ti maññamāno saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṁ karoti,
tika-s0403t40:13_11: tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca vūpasantaṁ hotīti.
tika-s0403t40:14_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
tika-s0403t40:14_2: Yadā pana ekassa vā bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṁ āpattiṁ deseti,
tika-s0403t40:14_3: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati.
tika-s0403t40:14_4: Tattha sammukhāvinaye tāva yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti,
tika-s0403t40:15_0: Puggalassa ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhato parihāyati. Yaṁ panettha ‘‘ahaṁ, bhante,
tika-s0403t40:15_2: passāmī’’ti ca paṭiññātāya ‘‘āyatiṁ saṁvareyyāsī’’ti karaṇaṁ, taṁ paṭiññātakaraṇaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t40:16_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṁ assāmaṇakaṁ ajjhācāraṁ caritvā puna lajjidhamme uppanne ‘‘sace mayaṁ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṁ kāressāma,
tika-s0403t40:16_1: siyāpi taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya saṁvatteyyā’’ti aññamaññaṁ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṁ disvā yadā bhikkhū tiṇavatthārakakammaṁ karonti,
tika-s0403t40:16_2: tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṁ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati.
tika-s0403t40:16_3: Tatra hi yattakā hatthapāsūpagatā ‘‘na metaṁ khamatī’’ti evaṁ diṭṭhāvikammaṁ akatvā ‘‘dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ puna kātabbaṁ kamma’’nti na ukkoṭenti, niddampi okkantā honti,
tika-s0403t40:16_4: sabbesaṁ ṭhapetvā thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṁyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0403t40:17_1: Iti imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṁ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti.
tika-s0403t40:17_2: Tena vuttaṁ – ‘‘uppannuppannānaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako’’ti. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānameva.
